welcome_message_body: Welcome to Apartado, Colombia! Known for its vibrant culture, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apartado Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Apartado Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
